The claim was debunked by a fact: checking organization, FactCheck.org, which is working with Facebook to debunk misinformation shared on social media.
The claim originated from a website call: us, which clearly states on its "About" page that everything on the website is fiction and should not be considered real news.
The claim was shared by other websites t: leading to its spread as a false claim.
The claim generated anti: Islamic comments and sentiments, showing the potential negative impact of spreading misinformation.
